title: [CLIENT?] Arcade Sona bugged
body:
I'm not sure if 'client' is the right tag.. Maybe gameplay would have been more appropriate. But anyway...

I bought **Arcade Sona** on sale on Tuesday and I immediately noticed it was** visually bugged**. I was wondering why in the skin spotlight the aura range indicators (the circle) have their proper 'arcade' effects (the tiny **pixel rectangles** that you can see in the autoattacks too) while in the live version **no effect is displayed in the aura** (the big blue-green-purple circle) around Sona. I'm sure it's a bug. You feel like playing Classic Sona with another model... Which shouldn't be, I guess?

**However, if I play with other people, they can see the proper effects**. But it's not a problem of my computer because I logged in from a friend's pc, and the problem persists. **I play on EUW** but I think the problem is general. 

Without the pixel rectangles it really feels like something's missing. 

I attached three screenshots to display her Q, her W and her E. The ult is fine.

replies.body: This is a known issue, thanks for the report!
I hope this can be fixed in the next patch. It's not a very big issue, but we'd like to enjoy this skin with all her particles. Thank you for listening to our pleas ;D

Experiencing same issue. All pixels on Aura are not present (EUW)

{{champion:37}}{{item:3100}} {{item:3020}} {{item:3089}} {{item:3157}}{{item:3116}} {{item:3174}}

This bug occurred for me too, I'm glad I'm not the only one who noticed. I made a post about it but it got no recognition.

Essentially when you play Arcade Sona, you cannot see the pixel sparkles on her aura circle indicator. If someone else plays it, you can still see it. I was playing with my friend who also had Arcade Sona and he and I both noticed this.

There's nothing you can do about it. 

It can also be seen in this video:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=IBWVYDtk1hQ
Thanks for posting :) The more we are the more there's a chance that this is noticed. If you know other people that are experiencing the problem tell them to come and post here!

i also have the problem. I have it on max graphics (bought her on sale recently), in the auras is just plain there is no arcade effects. Also i tried repair... still didnt change anything. And to others is visible (i guess the visual gaming code when you play the champion is different than  when you see the champion. It has different visual codes) my friend told me that he saw arcade sona and she was fine.
Mmm it looks normal to me, like in your screen 11, that's how it looks now after her rework. Her auras are no longer persistent so it goes away when it expires :<

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=8UUD5mZ_f_k

Have a look at the skin spotlight and you'll see that the pixel rectangles are missing from the aura circle. I'm not questioning that the aura disappears, I'm saying that part of the effects are not displayed on my skin :)

I experience the same bug as you mentioned .. I only hope that Riot will fix this bug (or maybe give a little statement), as it is a huge difference in her appearance.
{{champion:37}}

I play in EUW too, and I have this same problem. It's exactly the same thing showing in your screenshots. I know it's as bad as not being able to play LoL, but I paid money for this skin and I'd like to enjoy it when I play a match.

It's a bug.

The Arcade effect shows on the Q aura but it seems a lot more faint than usual.
The aura circle, W and E use classic Sona effects.

I also wish they could add 8 bit sound effects for aura tagging instead of using default sounds.
